title: Long John Silver's Return to Treasure Island

sources.title: LongJohnSilverAppleTV2ndGen.
sources.description: 1954 directed by Byron Haskin starring Robert Newton as Long John and Kit Taylor as Jim Hawkins, with Connie Gilchrist, Lloyd Berrell, Grant Taylor, Rod Taylor and Harvey Adams . When Long John discovers that rival pirate Mendoza has captured a ship that has Jim Hawkins on it, he devises a plan to rescue him.   And of course, to also get some treasure.   Nice Technicolor picture with plenty of “aarghs.”
